Text:
Thanks a lot for all your uploads. My Ghost Story season 3 started up last week, if you can find the time to upload that, it would be much appreciated. If not that's fine, someone will upload it eventually, hopefully.

Thanks for GA!

FQM does My Ghost Story and is able to release it much quicker than I can.  

Check out the paranormaltvshows blogspot to be notified right when the shows are available and download links.
